rules.title: Respect All Players
rules.description: Do not use hate speech, offensive language, or personal attacks. Harassment, bullying, and discrimination are not tolerated.

rules.title: No Random Deathmatching (RDM)
rules.description: Do not kill players without a proper roleplay reason. Always engage in a meaningful RP scenario before resorting to violence.

rules.title: No Vehicle Deathmatching (VDM)
rules.description: Do not use vehicles to intentionally kill or harm other players without a roleplay reason.

rules.title: No Meta-Gaming
rules.description: Do not use out-of-character (OOC) information to benefit your in-game character. This includes stream sniping, using Discord for in-game advantages, etc.

rules.title: No Power Gaming
rules.description: Players cannot force actions on other players without giving them a chance to respond. Avoid unrealistic actions that break immersion.

rules.title: No Combat Logging
rules.description: Do not disconnect, respawn, or find other ways to avoid RP scenarios, especially if you're in danger or have been injured.

rules.title: Safe Zones
rules.description: Certain areas like hospitals, police stations, and spawn points are considered safe zones. No criminal activities or violence should occur in these areas.

rules.title: Value Your Life (VYL)
rules.description: If faced with a life-threatening situation (e.g., a gun to your head), you should value your life and act accordingly.

rules.title: No Microphone Spamming
rules.description: Do not play loud music, scream, or make disruptive noises over voice chat.

rules.title: New Life Rule (NLR)
rules.description: If your character dies, you cannot return to the location of your death or engage in the same situation for a set period (e.g., 15 minutes). You also shouldn't remember events leading up to your death.

rules.title: Roleplay Overrule
rules.description: Roleplay situations can override some of the standard rules. Always prioritize roleplay quality and immersion.

rules.title: Use Common Sense
rules.description: If a situation isn't explicitly covered by the rules, use your best judgment and prioritize good roleplay.

rules.title: Obey Server Staff
rules.description: If a staff member gives you an instruction or ruling, obey it. If you disagree, address it later in a respectful manner.

rules.title: No Exploiting or Cheating
rules.description: Using bugs, glitches, third-party software, or any other means to gain an unfair advantage is strictly prohibited.

rules.title: No Fail RP
rules.description: Always remain in character and behave realistically based on your character's background and current situation.
